question: JVP committeeÂ which was constituted in 1948-49 was related to which of the following ?
option2: Formation of new states on linguistic basis
answer: Formation of new states on linguistic basis
explanation: JVP committee was set up by the Congress to study the recommendations of Linguistic Provinces Commission (Dar Commission) . It comprised Jawaharlal Nehru, Vallabhbhai Patel and Pattabhi Sitaramayya. The committee gave its report on 1 April 1949 and said that time was NOT suitable for formation of new provinces. However, it also accepted presence of strong public sentiment towards linguistic states in the country.
